identity.name: com.ibm.streamsx.inet
identity.description:
Support for common internet protocols.
This toolkit separates its functionality into a number of namespaces:
* **com.ibm.streamsx.inet** General purpose internet operators. * **com.ibm.streamsx.inet.http** Operators that interact with external HTTP servers. * **com.ibm.streamsx.inet.rest** Operators that embed a HTTP server to provide REST style api to streaming data. * **com.ibm.streamsx.inet.wsserver** Operators that embed a WebSocket server to expose streaming data as WebSocket messages.
**Third-party Libraries** This toolkit embeds a number of third-party libraries under `opt`:
* Apache Commons Codec 1.4 * OAuth Signpost 1.2 [http://code.google.com/p/oauth-signpost/] * Jetty 8.1.3 from Eclipse 4.2.2 * Java-websocket 1.3.0 [http://java-websocket.org]
